revised_title: The Life and Scientific Contributions of Sir Vincent Brian Wigglesworth
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Sir Vincent Brian Wigglesworth, a renowned English zoologist and entomologist. Wigglesworth made significant contributions to the field of insect physiology and medical entomology. He conducted extensive research on various insects, focusing on their unique physiological processes and their role in controlling disease-carrying insects. His work led to numerous publications and the development of the first edition of The Principles of Insect Physiology in 1939.
